page.title: 18Supernatural Chaldon Hills
page.content: This story concerns Daggers Gate and the supposed powers attributed to a witch to "overlook" someone, to work evil by taking the form of a hare to torment that person. A woman living at Sleight in 1789 was described as a witch. A farmer had had poor luck for years.An enormous doe was seen to come from Sleight and was shot and wounded by him.The witch subsequently appeared lame.The doe was later killed by a shepherd, whereupon the farmer found the witch dead. A witch could not be buried in the Churchyard so she was buried at Daggers Gate. Years later the farmer was killed by a mad woman on his way home from market at the same spot. He is said to haunt the scene of his murder.
